page.title: 12A DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: WHEN I WAKE UP IN THE MORNING I GO DOWN-STAIRS AND HAVE MY BREAKFAST. I HAVE CORNFLAKES AND TWO PIECES OF TOAST.AT TWENTY-FIVE TO NINE I GO OUT WALK UP THE LANE TO CATCH THE BUS.I GET TO SCHOOL AT TEN TO NINE AND WE WAIT OUT IN THE PORCH.MRS WALSH COMES OUT AT NINE 0'CLOCK TO CALL US IN CLASS.I LIKE DOING MATHS IT IS MY FAVOURITE SUBJECT.I QUITE LIKE DOING EVERYTHING BECAUSE YOU HAVE QUITE ALOT TO DO.WHEN I GET HOME I WATCH ABIT OF TELEVISION AND THEN GO OUTSIDE TO PLAY.I HELP DAD SOME NIGHTS.SOME SCHOOL NIGHTS I GO TO PLAY WITH IAN OR HELP FEED THE SHEEP AND LAMBS.IN THE WINTER I FEED THE SHEEP WITH SILAGE, BARLEY OR MILK.AT SCHOOL ITS QUITE FUN THE FIRST BREAK IS 1O-30 TO 10-45 SECOND BREAK 12-30 TO 1-15 THE LAST BREAK IS 2-30 TO 2-45.
